content: Directionally, for our full year 2022 operations by segment as compared to 2021, we expect: for SSR, we forecast improved operating results and higher revenue; ROV days on hire are projected to increase year-over-year by a double-digit percentage with tooling-based services results generally following ROV days on hire; survey results are expected to improve on higher levels of activity as well; SSR forecasted adjusted EBITDA margins are expected to average in the low 30% range for the full year.
